name: Cheese Studios - FPS Demo
description:
This game is a face-paced, rogue-like, first person shooter where you shoot enemy shapes. You must defeat enough enemies to get the energy to power the portal in the level. Going through the portal will complete the level. 

Blast your way through enemies and avoid hitting them in this fun neon-styled game.

Controls: W, A, S, D, to move | Right click to shoot | Move mouse to look around

Watch the progress of the game on my YouTube channel:
